articles.description: Casemiro's wife defends her husband following criticism after Sunday's 3-0 defeat by Liverpool, reminding people of the many trophies he has won.
articles.title: Manchester United: Casemiro's wife hits back after criticism

articles.description: Great Britain's Ellie Challis wins gold with a dominant performance in the women's 50m backstroke final.

articles.title: NFL 2024 season predictions: Who will win Super Bowl & MVP award?

articles.description: The amount clubs can charge for away tickets in Europe's three men's club competitions will be reduced this season.
articles.title: Champions League, Europa League, Conference League: Uefa lowers price caps for away fans

articles.description: Italy's Valentina Petrillo becomes the first openly transgender athlete to compete at a Paralympic Games after qualifying for the women's T12 400m semi-finals.
articles.title: Valentina Petrillo: First openly transgender athlete qualifies for women's T12 400m semi-finals

articles.description: South Africa Rugby Union apologise to New Zealand over "highly regrettable disruption" to the closing stages of their haka before the hosts' victory on Saturday in Johannesburg.
articles.title: South Africa v New Zealand:  SA Rugby apologise for 'highly regrettable' haka disruption

articles.description: Britain's Stephen McGuire wins Paralympic boccia gold, defeating Colombia's Edilson Chica to win the BC4 men's individual title.
articles.title: Paralympics: GB's Stephen McGuire wins boccia gold at Paris 2024
